statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE adherence_status = 'On Time';
SELECT employee_name, attendance_date, clock_in_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, clock_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT employee_name, adherence_status FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE clock_in_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE clock_out_time IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, attendance_date FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE adherence_status = 'Late' ORDER BY attendance_date ASC, clock_in_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, attendance_date, adherence_status FROM EmployeeAttendance WHERE clock_out_time IS NULL AND employee_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT attendance_date, AVG(clock_out_time - clock_in_time) AS average_work_hours FROM EmployeeAttendance GROUP BY attendance_date HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 1 ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT employee_id, check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'present';
SELECT employee_id, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM work_schedule WHERE work_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM work_schedule ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(end_time - start_time) AS average_hours FROM work_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY check_in DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE check_in > '2022-01-01' AND check_out < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY check_in ASC;

SELECT e.employee_id, w.work_date, w.start_time, w.end_time FROM employee_attendance e JOIN work_schedule w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE e.attendance_status = 'Late' ORDER BY w.work_date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.check_out, w.work_date, w.start_time, w.end_time FROM employee_attendance e LEFT JOIN work_schedule w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE w.work_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY e.check_out DESC, w.work_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT e.employee_id, e.attendance_status FROM employee_attendance e JOIN work_schedule w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE w.start_time > '08:00' AND w.end_time < '17:00';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM schedules WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_name, check_in, check_out FROM employees JOIN attendance ON employees.employee_id = attendance.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR'
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_department DESC
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name
SELECT employee_name, schedule_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM employees JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id WHERE schedule_date = '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM WorkSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' OR position = 'Supervisor';
SELECT attendance_id, clock_in, clock_out, duration FROM Attendance WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id), department FROM Employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT A.clock_in, A.clock_out, W.start_time, W.end_time FROM Attendance A, WorkSchedule W WHERE A.employee_id = W.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, start_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT tracking_id, employee_id, score FROM performance_tracking WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT attendance.employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time, work_date FROM attendance JOIN schedules ON attendance.employee_id = schedules.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules INNER JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE work_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM performance_tracking GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS employee_count FROM departments LEFT JOIN employees ON departments.department_name = employees.department GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
